pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION
pluginstrument.description:
CRJ PFD MFD EICAS Overlay Bezel See here for contact info and notes: https://github.com/simstrumentation
Ambient lighting is only supported while using the SIMSTRUMENTATON Ambient Light Dimmer control.
Notes: - There is a user prop to set position to Pilot or CoPilot or EICAS. - There is a user prop to show or hide a dimmer knob to control the PFD/MFD brightness.
